title: Won a Ranked Match, gained 0LP.
body:
I just played a Ranked Match as Azir, and won. Afterwards, I didn't gain any LP though. If possible, is there a way to get my well-deserved LP for the win?  (I was Silver 5 with 0LP before the match, and Silver 5 with 0LP after the win)

I provided a screenshot to show that I'm still 0LP despite the win. 

Link of the Match: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2406558661/1?tab=overview

replies.body:
It looks like you were in the negative LP values before this match due to some queue dodging (which costs LP). Since the client has some issues displaying negative values, you won't see a change from negative values until you reach the value of 0 or over. I hope that makes sense!

If you have any other questions, let me know.

BTW Targons Blade, I just looked through a few of your posts on these boards today, and you have the patience of a saint. 

(not reflective on this post in particular but your afternoon's work)
